data.question: What is the empirical formula of LA1-Zr6 8-flu?
At what temperature (K) was the crystal system of LA1-Zr6 8-flu analyzed?
What is the space group of LA1-Zr6 8-csq?
What is the calculated BET surface area (m2/g) for LA2-Zr6 12-shp?
Is the framework of LA1-Zr6 12-shp stable after being treated with water?
data.answer: No, the PXRD patterns and N2 sorption measurements suggest partial decomposition.

data.question: What is the maximum water uptake (cm3 g-1) for LC2-Zr6 12-fcu?
Does LA3-Zr6 8-flu retain its water sorption performance after multiple cycles?
data.answer: Yes, it retains most of the cycling performance integrity between the first and last water sorption cycle.

data.question: Is the structure of LC2-Zr6 12-fcu isostructural to LC1-Zr6 12-fcu?
Does the insertion of methyl groups in the biphenyl core of LA3-Zr6 8-flu increase the dihedral angle between the two inner phenyl rings?
What is the role of the SQUEEZE program in the analysis of MOFs' structures?
data.answer: It is used to remove the electron densities of highly disordered solvent molecules in the structures.

data.question: What topology does LB2-Zr6 8-scu adopt?

Is the PXRD pattern of LC2-Zr6 12-fcu indexed and fitted using the Le Bail method?
What is the effect of water treatment on the structure of LB1-Zr6 8-flu?
data.answer: The PXRD patterns and N2 sorption measurements indicate partial decomposition.

data.question: What is the calculated pore volume (cm3/g) for LA1-Zr6 8-flu?
Does the structure of LA2-Zr6 8-csq show a decrease in water adsorption capacity after the first cycle?
What is the role of the di(1-adamantyl)-n-butylphosphine in the synthesis of ligands?
data.answer: It is used as a ligand in palladium-catalyzed cross-coupling reactions.

data.question: What is the significance of the DFT calculations performed on the selected ligand fragments?
data.answer: The DFT calculations were performed to understand the flexibility of the ligands by analyzing the energy profile with respect to the torsion angle.
